results.definition: representation of something (sometimes on a smaller scale)
the act of giving a false appearance
(computer science) the technique of representing the real world by a computer program
examples: a simulation should imitate the internal processes and not merely the results of the thing being simulated

results.definition: the act of imitating the behavior of some situation or some process by means of something suitably analogous (especially for the purpose of study or personnel training)
